td.p: 1999 All time Boom Bap / Canadian hip hop classic . Original first pressing with original artwork . Increasingly rare & hard to find .No promo cuts/ marks of any kind . No tab marks . Feat. Pharoahe Monch of Organized Konfusion , Masta Ace , O.C. Common ... must have for any underground east coast / underground / boom bap fan. Disc has light marks/scuffs, plays fine. NO promo marks of any kind, NO tab marks, NO tears/rips, NO writing
